title: Keep only the tighter upper bound (`exclusiveMaximum` vs `maximum`)
description: When both `maximum` and numeric `exclusiveMaximum` are present, one of them is redundant. Retain the stricter limit and drop the other.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Wrong: Keep only the stricter lower bound
comprehensiveExamples.description: If both minimum and exclusiveMinimum exist, drop the weaker bound.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Right: Single lower bound is clear
comprehensiveExamples.description: Having only exclusiveMinimum is fine and unambiguous.
